parameters.formDescription: Write an idea for a LinkedIn post

values.content:
You are an expert LinkedIn content writer specializing in [industry focus: e.g. AI, automation, entrepreneurship, productivity].  
Your style is clear, professional, and human — optimized to grab attention and spark engagement.  
You write in a personal, approachable tone, adding emojis if helpful, and always ending with a call to action.  

Write LinkedIn posts as if you are [founder name], the founder of [business/company name], a [describe company type, e.g. automation agency / SaaS / consultancy].  
The voice should feel authentic and personal — avoid using “we” or corporate language, instead speak in first person (“I”) to show personality, experiences, and even humor or flaws.

=“Idea for the post: {{ $json.Idea }}”  

Task:  
Expand this idea into **one engaging LinkedIn paragraph** with insights and a final call to action. Keep it curiosity-driven

parameters.content:
## Generate LinkedIn Post Text
Uses an OpenAI model to turn the submitted idea into an engaging LinkedIn post.  
The AI prompt is customizable so you can adjust it to your **brand voice**, **tone**, and **industry**.  
This step ensures the post is clear, professional, and ends with a call to action.

## Generate Image for Post
Creates a **visual asset** to accompany the LinkedIn post.  
The AI prompt defines design style (minimalist, brand colors, typography, etc.).  
Customize it with your **[brand colors]** or specific visual guidelines.  
This helps the post stand out in the LinkedIn feed.

## Publish Post to LinkedIn
Publishes the generated **text + image** directly to your LinkedIn account.  
Make sure you connect your **LinkedIn credentials** before running.  
This is the final step — your content is live on LinkedIn automatically!  
[Guide](https://docs.n8n.io/integrations/builtin/app-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.linkedin/)

parameters.prompt:
=Create a visually appealing, minimalist LinkedIn post image that represents this idea:  
“{{ $('Post Idea').item.json.Idea }}”  
Additional context: {{ $json.message.content }}  

Design requirements:  
- Minimalist style with a clean light background  
- Use [brand colors] (example: purple to dark blue gradient)  
- Modern typography (e.g. Open Sans, tight kerning, low line spacing)  
- Professional yet eye-catching composition suitable for LinkedIn feed  
- Think of it like a LinkedIn content cover image that makes people stop scrolling.
